segments.text: I'm just observing this kitchen, taking it all in calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink has water running over, forming a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on the floor, but she's stepping in it unknowingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, the cookie jar is accessible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on the stool, one hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit unstable, which catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, cooperating quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly by the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's an ordinary scene with subtle tensions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the stool to be so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR
